text: Charles Broadbeck (3 October 1868 - 31 December 1944) was a Swiss gymnast. He competed in the men's individual all-around event at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Swiss male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Switzerland Category:Gymnasts at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:People from Évian-les-Bains
title: Charles Broadbeck
